[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: create_operator_cap()] [Unlimited Creation] Can admin create unlimited operator caps without any restrictions, proliferating operator access and increasing attack surface? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: create_operator_cap()] [Privilege Escalation] Can created OperatorCap be transferred to malicious address to gain operator privileges for executing deposits/withdrawals and operations? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: create_operator_cap()] [No Revocation] Does create_operator_cap lack corresponding revocation mechanism, allowing compromised operator caps to remain active indefinitely? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: create_operator_cap()] [Tracking Issue] Can operator caps be created without proper registry/tracking, making it impossible to audit which operators have access? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: set_operator_freezed()] [Freeze Bypass] Can frozen operator still call functions that don't check freeze status (e.g., retrieve_deposit_withdraw_fee_operator)? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: set_operator_freezed()] [Race Condition] Can operator race against set_operator_freezed(freezed=true) to complete malicious operation before being frozen? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: set_operator_freezed()] [Wrong Operation Object] Does set_operator_freezed verify that Operation object passed is the correct shared object for this deployment? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: set_operator_freezed()] [State Inconsistency] Can set_operator_freezed be called for non-existent op_cap_id, adding spurious entries to freezed_operators table? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: set_operator_freezed()] [Unfreeze Attack] Can admin unfreeze malicious operator (freezed=false) to allow them to complete pending malicious operations? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: set_operator_freezed()] [Event Spam] Can set_operator_freezed be called repeatedly with same parameters to spam OperatorFreezed events for same operator? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: add_switchboard_aggregator()] [Oracle Manipulation] Can admin add malicious Switchboard aggregator with incorrect decimals or stale prices to manipulate vault USD value calculations? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: add_switchboard_aggregator()] [Decimal Confusion] Can add_switchboard_aggregator be exploited with wrong decimals parameter (e.g., decimals=6 instead of 9) causing 1000x price inflation/deflation? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: add_switchboard_aggregator()] [Asset Type Collision] Can add_switchboard_aggregator overwrite existing asset_type oracle configuration, causing price inconsistency for active assets? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: add_switchboard_aggregator()] [Timing Attack] Can admin add aggregator during active operation to change price source mid-operation, causing total_usd_value calculation errors? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: add_switchboard_aggregator()] [DoS] Can add_switchboard_aggregator be called with invalid aggregator reference that always fails on price reads, DoSing all operations? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: add_switchboard_aggregator()] [Staleness Bypass] Does add_switchboard_aggregator initialize assets_value_updated timestamp correctly or can stale prices be accepted immediately after adding? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: remove_switchboard_aggregator()] [Asset Orphaning] Can remove_switchboard_aggregator be called for asset_type that vault actively holds, causing inability to price that asset in total_usd_value? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: remove_switchboard_aggregator()] [DoS Attack] Can admin remove oracle for principal coin type, making all deposit/withdraw executions fail due to missing price feed? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: remove_switchboard_aggregator()] [Timing Exploit] Can remove_switchboard_aggregator be called during operation while asset of that type is borrowed, causing value update failures? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: remove_switchboard_aggregator()] [State Corruption] Does remove_switchboard_aggregator clean up assets_value and assets_value_updated entries, or leave stale data in tables? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: change_switchboard_aggregator()] [Price Manipulation] Can admin change aggregator to malicious one with manipulated prices to inflate/deflate vault valuation for profit? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: change_switchboard_aggregator()] [Decimal Mismatch] Does change_switchboard_aggregator preserve decimals setting from previous aggregator or can decimal precision change, causing price calculation errors? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: change_switchboard_aggregator()] [Timing Attack] Can change_switchboard_aggregator be front-run before user deposit execution to manipulate share ratio calculation? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: change_switchboard_aggregator()] [Mid-Operation Change] Can aggregator be changed while vault is VAULT_DURING_OPERATION_STATUS, causing different price sources for start_op vs end_op value checks? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: change_switchboard_aggregator()] [Validation Missing] Does change_switchboard_aggregator verify new aggregator is valid and provides recent prices before accepting the change? (Medium)
